text: Vibrator could mean several different types of devices: * Vibrator (sensual) - a device used for massage or masturbation * vibrator (mechanical) - a class of devices that creates mechanical vibrations * vibrator (electronic) – an old- fashioned electronic component * vibrator (music) – a musical instrument Vibrator could also mean: *The Vibrators a British punk band *Vibrator (album), a 1995 album by Terence Trent D'Arby *"Vibrator," a song on Motörhead's self-titled album
title: Vibrator
